summary: An American cowboy is hired to work on a ranch in Africa, and winds up having to fight predators, the four and two-legged kinds.
cast: Hugh O'Brian|John Mills|Nigel Green|Tom Nardini|Adrienne Corri|Ronald Howard|Charles Malinda|Honey Wamala|Charles Hayes|Stephen Kikumu|Ali Twaha|Mohammed Abdullah|Hayley Mills
title: Dos tejanos en la selva
